mapper.select: select mb_id, mb_name, mb_phone from mb_tb order by mb_id desc

SELECT mb_name, mb_id, mb_phone FROM ( SELECT mb_name, mb_id, mb_phone , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY mb_id DESC) as user_seq FROM mb_tb
) DS WHERE user_seq BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd}
select od_num, mb_id, od_name, od_price, od_date, delivery from order_tb

select o.od_num, o.mb_id, o.od_name, o.od_zipcode, o.od_addr, o.od_addr_d, o.od_phone, o.od_price, o.od_date, d.pd_num, p.pd_amount, p.pd_name, p.pd_img, o.delivery from order_tb o inner join detailorder_tb d on o.od_num = d.od_num inner join product_tb p on d.pd_num = p.pd_num where o.od_num = #{od_num}
